edu.washington.cs.cse490h.lib
Class Replay

java.lang.Object
  edu.washington.cs.cse490h.lib.Replay

public class Replay
extends java.lang.Object

Class that handles deterministic replay in both the simulator and emulator. All external events (seed generation, user commands, incoming messages) are recorded and replayed from a log file. File commands are assumed to not change. This utility is meant to provide an opportunity to output more debugging information about a previous execution. In the emulator environment particularly, the execution may not be valid if the implementation changes.

getPacket

protected static Packet getPacket()
                           throws Packet.CorruptPacketException
Read the next packet from the replay input file. If there are no more packets, replay is stopped.

Returns:
The packet that was read
Throws:
Packet.CorruptPacketException - If there is an error in the read packet
